template_info.name: Grass-Type Garden
template_info.description: A defensive grass team specializing in status moves, healing, and gradual damage accumulation
template_info.usage_notes: Grass types excel at status moves and healing. Use Leech Seed, Sleep Powder, and recovery moves to outlast opponents.

pokemon.name: venusaur
pokemon.strategy: Primary status setter with recovery and healing
pokemon.tips: Leech Seed + Sleep Powder combo lets you heal while opponent takes damage

pokemon.name: vileplume
pokemon.strategy: Powerful grass/poison attacker with status moves
pokemon.tips: Petal Dance is very powerful but causes confusion - use strategically

pokemon.name: victreebel
pokemon.strategy: Aggressive grass type with physical and special options
pokemon.tips: Higher attack stat makes it effective with physical grass moves

pokemon.name: exeggutor
pokemon.strategy: Bulky grass/psychic with dual typing advantages
pokemon.tips: Psychic typing gives coverage against poison types

pokemon.name: parasect
pokemon.strategy: 100% accurate sleep move with healing support
pokemon.tips: Spore never misses - use it to shut down dangerous threats

pokemon.name: tangela
pokemon.strategy: Defensive grass type with stat boosting
pokemon.tips: Growth boosts both attacks - surprising offensive potential after setup
